description: DevLab is an AI-powered coding practice, assessment, and competition microservice. It generates coding questions, evaluates code solutions, produces test cases, detects AI-generated code (fraud detection), creates AI-vs-learner competitions, and generates interactive HTML components with CodeMirror. DevLab receives and processes requests from multiple microservices through the Coordinator gateway: (1) Content Studio – receives requests to generate coding questions, validate trainer-authored questions, and transform exercises into validated question formats; when Content Studio requests theoretical question generation, the request is forwarded by DevLab to the Assessment Service; (2) Assessment Service – receives forwarded requests for theoretical question generation from DevLab, and sends coding questions to DevLab when requested. ;(3) Learning Analytics - receives pull-based queries for competition performance data and learner analytics; (4) Course Builder Service - receives course completion notifications when a learner completes a specific course, which triggers user profile creation, course completion recording, and automatic AI competition question generation for that learner.
capabilities: provide AI-powered hints for coding questions
execute code in secure sandbox environment
generate HTML components for interactive coding questions
transform trainer exercises into validated question format
process course completion notifications from Course Builder
create and update user profiles on course completion
auto-generate AI competition questions for completed courses
provide competition performance data queries for Learning Analytics
filter competition records by learner_id, course_id, competition_id, or status
return analytics data from competitions_vs_ai table
